snippet: Eduardo Cunha is suspected of accepting at least $5 million in bribes linked to a sprawling kickback scandal at the state-run oil company, Petrobras.
abstract: Brazilian police raid Speaker Eduardo Cunha's home as part of  sweeping graft investigation; Cunha is suspected of accepting at least $5 million amid bribery scandal at state-controlled oil giant Petrobras.
lead_paragraph: Eduardo Cunha is suspected of accepting at least $5 million in bribes linked to a sprawling kickback scandal at the state-run oil company, Petrobras.

headline.main: Brazil: Speaker’s House Is Raided in Graft Inquiry
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Brazil: Speaker’s House Is Raided in Graft Inquiry
